Title: Requires the department of health examine heat related deaths in the state of New York
Summary: Requires the department of health examine heat-related deaths in the state of New York; requires the department to issue a report to the temporary president of the senate and speaker of the assembly.
LawCode: Add ยง212, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to requiring the department of health examine heat vulnerability and heat-related deaths
